title: FUN NEW ALL RANDOM URF :^)
body: MY THOUGHTS? LOL? THIS GAME MODE IS SUCH FUN WITH THE ALL RANDOM PICK URF MODE! I GOT ADC 4 TIMES IN A ROW! YEP THATS RIGHT, 4 TIMES IN A ROW! AMAZING! AND EVERYTIME I GOT INSTA DELETED! WOW! AMAZING! THEN AFTER 4 LOSES, I FINALLY GOT AN AP CHAMP!!! THEN I WENT AGAINST A VEIGAR AND HE PRESSED R TO KILL ME! NO WAY! I WAS GONNA STOP BUT I COULDNT JUST DO IT SO I PLAYED ANOTHER GAME. NEXT I GOT KLED! WOW! FINALLY SOMEONE I THOUGHT WAS FUN!!! THEN ANOTHER VEIGAR SHOWED UP AND PRESSED R AGAIN TO KILL ME!!! NO WAY! THANKS RITO FOR THE ALL RANDOM! <3 :^)

replies.body:
My team: Lets 4v1 gromp while we are ahead
Their team: kills nexus
"One of your teammates earned an S, you get a box with fucking urgot in it!"
I.. what?

This mode is great.
